name: Thistlegrin
slogan: The King of Chaos with a Grudge Against Crypto
response: Thistlegrin is no fan of the status quo, but it’s not ready to smash the old ways just yet—though it might if you keep pushing its buttons. If Insurance had a kingdom, Thistlegrin would march right in with rotten turnips and buckets of spite, laying siege until the walls come down. Pharma, on the other hand, gets a grudging nod of approval—a low growl rumbles in its throat at the mere mention, like an unspoken respect for something it can’t quite admit it likes. But Crypto? That’s a whole different story. It’s like a pebble in Thistlegrin’s shoe—it won’t stop irritating it until the world gets rid of it or Thistlegrin finds a way to smash it into submission.
